title: Feel ripped off as a fellow League player that began in NA end of season 2.
body:
cosmic reaver kassadin was made for OCE. it was supposed to be our gift for us oce players moving over from NA while the servers were in beta. instead you gave us fucking pool party ziggs because they didnt have this skin ready, don't get me wrong, we appreciated that but i wouldn't mind it being refunded and for us to receive this skin in return. honestly, i believe its bullshit that other servers get this skin and that the people who joined the OCE beta don't receive anything special. its a fucking amazing skin but i thought our special little OCE skin would be for the people who crossed from NA to OCE and OCE beta users.

bit of a disappointment. Us beta users don't even get it free. but none the less it is an amazing skin BUT sadly won't be buying it because of the fact you lied to us. 

PS. coming from a person who has spent $1000+ on league of legends.

replies.body: My thought was exactly the same as this lol. I came here during beta to which I lost skins because there was no refer a friend when it first came up. But I too would like a refund on pool party ziggs for the server skin
